author: Anjli P
title: The only hotel for NY visits - Review
text:
Love the hotel's
- contemporary design
- atmosphere, which is relaxed like Soho House
- food, the avocado toast was delicious
- coffee
- proximity to restaurants
- neighbourhood, quirky and gentrified
- proximity to LaGuardia airport, a short 10-15 minute drive away
- rooms and bathrooms, both were uncluttered and incredibly spacious
- views of Manhattan from our room
- proximity to Manhattan, a short subway ride away and parallel to the Upper East Side
- value for money
I absolutely loved the bathrooms. The lighting was flattering and the sinks were the perfect size and depth. Also love that the sinks weren't under-mounted.
I've always hated the drive from Manhattan to LaGuardia and vice versa, both the cost and the length, and this hotel solves that problem. I'm perfectly happy to take the subway to Manhattan, stay on the island all day, and return to the hotel in the evening. Now that I've discovered this hotel, I would never stay in Manhattan ever again.
